Purpose: Detection and quantification of autoantibodies against U3 RNP (fibrillarin) for diagnosis and monitoring of systemic sclerosis and related autoimmune conditions.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST) for serum; EDTA or heparin anticoagulant tube for plasma
Equipment: ELISA kit with microplate reader, pipettes, incubator, and plate washer
